system.sustained:
Fires out a flamethrower-like spray of Warpfire. Can be avoided as if a Spray Weapon. Deals 1d10 + Psy Rating + Corruption Bonus Energy Damage with Corruption Bonus Penetration and Flame and Spray Qualities. Characters that suffer damage from this attack must make a +30 Willpower Test or suffer 1 Corruption per Degree of Failiure.
If power is Successfully manifested, gain Corruption Points equal to the Psy Rating used to manifest this power after its effects have been resolved.
